title: Danny Dyer's Right Royal Family
overview: Danny is delving into the lives of his royal and noble forebears to find out how they lived, immersing himself in their pursuits, passions and lifestyles. From the Vikings to the Tudors, Danny dresses, eats and lives his way through his family tree. And his journey is a retelling of 800 years of British history--which is all there in his extraordinary bloodline.
